articles.description: Mohamed Salah was "out of order" for arguing with Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp on the touchline at West Ham, says Chris Sutton.

articles.description: Heavyweight boxer Francis Ngannou's 18-month-old son passes away.
articles.title: Francis Ngannou: Young son of boxer and former UFC champion dies

articles.description: Manchester United are willing to listen to offers for virtually all their first-team squad this summer.
articles.title: Manchester United ready to listen to offers for most of squad

articles.title: Kane & Bellingham set for Champions League showdown

articles.description: Travis Kelce signs a new two-year contract with the Kansas City Chiefs, making him the NFL's highest-paid tight end.

articles.description: Iga Swiatek and Ons Jabeur both progress to the Madrid Open quarter-finals thanks to straight-set victories.

articles.description: British heavyweight Anthony Joshua believes his next fight will be in September, at Wembley Stadium in London.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua expects to fight at Wembley Stadium in September
